name: Summon Giant Ally III
components: V, S, F/DF (bit of cloth from a giant’s bag)
text: This spell functions as summon giant ally I, except you can summon one ash or cloud giant; 1d3 desert, fire, frost, or jungle giants; or 1d4+1 cave, hill, marsh, river, slag, stone, or wood giants.
text_zh: 此法术如同召唤自然盟友V（summon nature’s ally V），除了召唤的是1个木灵神（kodama）或1d3个（fukujin）或1d4+1个式神（shikigami）。
